job_description:
Job Responsibilities:

Account Management
• Expand the company’s connections, alliances, industry resources, and referral pipelines through targeted networking strategies.
• Recognize, anticipate, and resolve operational and process problems that arise.
• Provide exemplary customer service, exhibiting excellent phone communication and active listening skills for all client interactions.
• Promptly and effectively address and resolve client concerns or issues as they arise, ensuring a high level of client satisfaction.
• Leverage data analysis and market insights to identify and capitalize on growth opportunities for client accounts.

Sales
• Articulate company value, gain access to and build relationships with key client contacts and decision-makers, and leverage industry/marketplace referrals.
• Maintain an awareness of competitive industry knowledge to stay ahead in the marketplace.
• Develop sales goals/targets annually to closely align lines of business.
• Develop comprehensive sales plans to generate new business and grow existing accounts. Regularly review and adjust these plans as needed.
• Develop objectives, key results, and key performance indicators, and monitor ability to generate a positive return on investment.
• Generate accurate price quotes based on customer requirements, catering to both existing and prospective clients.

Marketing
• Employ marketing skills to approach potential new clients effectively and expand the client base.
• Develops and implements strategic marketing plans and sales plans/forecasts to achieve corporate objectives for products and services.
• Oversee marketing strategy across lines of business, recommending and implementing Marketing strategy.
• Utilize relevant market research to assess product and market trends to identify a need or market opportunity.
• Other Duties as assigned.

Education & Experience:
• Bachelor’s Degree in Sales, Business Administration, Marketing or similar.
• Experience in the insurance space highly desired.
• 5+ years of management experience
• Strong leadership and demonstrated examples of improving processes and driving change within an organization.
• Experience in the P/C and/or claims spaces.
#J-18808-Ljbffr
